Exam Kernel
===========

``exam_kernel`` is a configurable restriced IPython kernel based kernel used for examinations and assignments.
It can be configured to block certain imports and magic commands and to pre-load imports or arbitrary code on load.

Head over to the configuration section to find out more about it.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   user_guide/installation
   user_guide/configuration
